posts.post_content:
Posted By: Jim
I have eleven cards for sale for the prices listed beside them.  The price includes shipping and delivery confirmation.  You may purchase insurance if you would like. Please e-mail me for scans and/or questions regarding these cards.
1) Rube Marquard Portrait PSA 4 $160
2) Clark Griffith Portrait PSA 4 $150 SOLD
3) Bobby Wallace PSA 4 $135 SOLD
4) Chief Bender Pitching, Trees PSA 4 $170 SOLD
5) Jack Chesbro PSA 4 $200
6) John McGraw Finger in Air PSA 5 $275
7) Chick Gandil Tolstoi Back PSA 5 $250
8) John McGraw Portrait w/Cap PSA 5 $285
9) George Davis PSA 5 $235
10) Chief Bender Pitching, No Trees PSA 5 $300 SOLD
11) James Westlake (Southern Leaguer) PSA 4 $140 SOLD
I will not be able to send scans until tomorrow (Friday) evening.

Posted By: Hank Levy
Jim
Please send scans of Marquard, Griffith, Chesbro, Gandil, Bender no trees & Westlake to:
henryjlevy@yahoo.com

Thanks,
Hank

Posted By: Jim
I will send requested scans later this evening.

Posted By: Ben
Hi,
Please send scans of the Bender (trees) and the Bobby Wallace.  My email is Nhale5516@aol.com
Thanks,
Ben

Posted By: Jim
Feel free to make offers on any of these cards or all that have not been sold.

Both McGraws, Gandil, and Chesbro - thanks,  Brian
